dependencies: MySQL 8 dev database via Docker driver (Atlas env dev URL: /atlas.hcl -> dev = "docker://mysql/8/dev")
deployment_relevant_files: /Dockerfile (packages migrations into an Atlas container image)
/atlas.hcl (Atlas environment config; points to schema and migrations dir; MySQL dev via Docker)
architectural_resources: Relational database: MySQL (local dev via Docker; production implied e.g., AWS RDS per plan.md)
Container image for migrations (Dockerfile builds an image based on arigaio/atlas)
Application database schema resources: tables users, posts; foreign key posts.user_id -> users.id (schema.hcl and migrations/*.sql)
